message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $1,450,000. I believe this offer reflects its true value and presents a fair deal for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,350,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,450,000 is already a very competitive price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and lower my offer slightly to $1,400,000. This is my final offer.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I am still constrained by my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,375,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your consideration.
